channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: India Strikes Pakistan Two Weeks After Kashmir Terrorist Attack

item.title: What to Watch at the Federal Reserve’s May Meeting
item.description: The U.S. central bank is widely expected to stick to a wait-and-see approach as officials brace for President Trump’s tariffs to stoke higher inflatio...

item.title: With Tears of Joy and Anxiety, Waiting for P.O.W.s to Come Home, at Last
item.description: In a parking lot in Ukraine, hundreds of family members gathered to greet loved ones being repatriated from Russian prisons. Amid happy reunions, ther...

item.title: Friedrich Merz Has a Tough Job as Germany’s Chancellor. It Just Got Tougher.
item.description: Friedrich Merz’s halting path to the chancellor’s office inflamed his challenges at home and abroad, including a threat from the far right.

item.title: ‘Conclave Fever’ in Rome, and Trump’s Plan to Send Migrants to Libya
item.description: Plus, your chance at island living.

item.title: Xi’s Visit to Russia Complicates China’s Courtship of Europe

item.title: Test Your Knowledge of the Papal Conclave
item.description: Are you ready for the conclave that will select the next pope? Take our quiz to see how you stack up with other Times readers.
